Name: PickCrafter
About the game: Mine gems, collect Pickaxes and discover treasure filled Biomes in PickCrafter! The popular mobile game PickCrafter is now available on your desktop! Break blocks and earn Picks in this pixel-style clicker! Craft and upgrade Legendary Pickaxes. Prestige to reach Extravagant, Transcendent, Preposterous, and Legendary tiers. Discover all the Biomes - find snow in the Tundra or explore space and alien worlds like the Moon or Mars. Unlock and use Abilities to boost your strength. Battle with your friends and rank up on the leaderboards! There are over 90 achievements to unlock. Rare, Epic, and Legendary items await you! Download now to unleash your inner treasure hunter in PickCrafter!
